title: From Dusk Till Dawn 1-3 PAL DVD9
description:
From Dusk Till Dawn 1-3
-----------------------


From Dusk till Dawn (1996)
--------------------------
"One night is all that stands between them and freedom. But it&#039;s going to be a hell of a night."

IMDB: <a href="
http://imdb.com/title/tt0116367/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imdb.com/title/tt0116367/</a>

Audio: English

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish

Extra Materials:
- Music Video: ZZ Top "She&#039;s Just Killing Me".
- Music Video: Tito & Tarantula "After Dark".
- Deleted Scenes & Alternate Takes.
- On the Set.
- Featurette: Hollywood Goes to Hell.
- Trailer.


Plot outline:
Seth Gecko and his younger brother Richard are on the lam after a bloody bank robbery in Texas. They escape across the border into Mexico and will be home-free the next morning, when they pay off the local kingpin. They just have to survive &#039;from dusk till dawn&#039; at the rendezvous point, which turns out to be a Hell of a strip joint.



From Dusk till Dawn 2 (1999)
----------------------------

IMDB: <a href="
http://imdb.com/title/tt0120860/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imdb.com/title/tt0120860/</a>

Audio: English

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish


Plot outline:
Five criminals get together to rob a bank in Mexico. On his way to their rendezvous point, one of them gets into an accident, and stumbles upon the Titty Twister Bar. This little detour sets up the terror that awaits the outlaws and the officers on their trail.



From Dusk till Dawn 3 (2000)
----------------------------

IMDB: <a href="
http://imdb.com/title/tt0120695/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imdb.com/title/tt0120695/</a>

Audio: English

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish

Extra Materials:
- Trailer.


Plot outline:
"Prequel" to the first From Dusk Till Dawn is set in Mexico in the early 1900&#039;s which begins with the escape of Johnny Madrid, a dangerous local outlaw, from the gallows who then kidnaps his hangman&#039;s beautiful daughter, Esmeralda, with a little help from Reece, a female outlaw from the U.S. With the hangman and a local posse on their trail, Johnny meets with his gang who all rob a stagecoach which contains American author Ambrose Bierce along with newlywed couple John and Mary Newlie. As night falls, all parties coincidently seek shelter in an isolated inn/whorehouse which is run by vampires led by the high priestess Quixtla who targets Esmeralda. Esmeralda is revealed to be the half-human, half-vampire princess Santanico Pandemonium, whom the vampires want as their heir in which all the humans must join forces if they are to survive the night from the vicious blood-suckers.
